tossup_question: -   –  An outflow of charged particles from the sun that escapes the sun’s outer atmosphere is called:
tossup_MCQoptions:
W) Solar discharge
X) Solar flare
Y) Solar wind
Z) Solar gust
bonus_question: -   –  When the air is saturated with moisture, which of the following statements is false?
bonus_MCQoptions:
W) Relative humidity is equal to 100%
X) Air temperature is equal to the dew point temperature
Y) Air temperature is equal to the wet bulb temperature
Z) An increase in temperature will produce condensation
bonus_answer: ANSWER: Z) AN INCREASE IN TEMPERATURE WILL PRODUCE CONDENSATION
